item.title: Language arts teachers, take note, experience Bram Stoker's Dracula in real time
item.description:
Dracula

Experience Bram Stoker's Dracula in a new way -- in real time. Dracula is an epistolary novel (a novel written as a series of letters or diary entries,) and this blog will publish each diary entry on the day that it was written by the narrator so that the audience â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
